thread.title: Newcastle man checks ticket on many phones, to confirm win
thread.title_full: Newcastle man checks ticket on many phones, to confirm win

author: Metroland Staff
title: Newcastle man checks ticket on many phones, to confirm win
text: A Newcastle man is making travel plans after winning a Lotto 6-49 second prize. Robert Genosko plays the lottery weekly, and won $101,904.60 in the Aug. 28 draw. !— Windows 8.1 + IE11 and above —> Robert Genosko won second-prize in a Lotto 6-49 ticket, winning $101,904.60 in August. A Newcastle man is making travel plans after winning a Lotto 6-49 second prize. Robert Genosko plays the lottery weekly, and won $101,904.60 in the Aug. 28 draw. Genosko uses OLG’s Quick Pick feature to make his selections and always adds Encore to his tickets. “I checked my ticket on the OLG app and was initially confused by what I saw,” Genosko said in a press release. “I checked my ticket on multiple phones to make sure what I was seeing was real. I was shocked and so happy.” Genosko first shared the news with his wife. “At first, she thought I had won $101, but when she looked a little closer, she was pleasantly surprised. Winning is an incredible feeling. It’s both shocking and unbelievable, but it could happen to you.” He plans to help his family and travel. “I plan to enjoy every moment of life with my family,” he concluded. The winning ticket was purchased at [Esso on King Avenue East](https://www.google.com/maps?sca_esv=00b2415a928ac49a&sca_upv=1&rlz=1C5CHFA_enCA999CA999&output=search&q=Esso+on+King+Avenue+East&source=lnms&fbs=AEQNm0C5IIOpSDYVh51ut_zQFgH585hUmXBEfiyc3KZbf5BCLrdAeHw6QgI_YgMUsbX0iPItlukb7cOdhfcpIKoAlDR2K-Tpc-QEntO4DRtQHosQ09Im1z6G49EGekMFw3NUymhwKBXk1rDrB5TuPUCJofRVbnLoVWwN-L_Plj7tx1j42BhX8mEFzjPEkYiEhPcYk9nQ7R-xPwY0k648GI19OayHqzlFCQ&entry=mc&ved=1t:200715&ictx=111) in Newcastle Contact us at [thenewsroom@metroland.com](mailto:thenewsroom@metroland.com) To join the conversation set a first and last name in your user profile.
